content.prompt_es: Fill in the blanks with the correct words to complete the sentences about proposals and evaluations.
content.main_text:
1. When writing a proposal, it is essential to clearly define the (1)___ of the project, outlining its objectives and expected outcomes.
2. A strong proposal often includes a detailed budget that justifies the (2)___ necessary to achieve the proposed goals.
3. Evaluations should provide (3)___ feedback that highlights both strengths and weaknesses in the implementation of the project.
4. It is advisable to use relevant data to support your (4)___, making your argument more persuasive.
5. A well-crafted executive summary can significantly enhance a proposal by providing a concise (5)___ of the entire document.
content.explanation:
(1) La 'scope' se refiere al alcance del proyecto, que es fundamental al redactar una propuesta.
(2) Los 'resources' son los recursos necesarios y deben estar claramente justificados en una propuesta sólida.
(3) El feedback 'constructive' es crucial para que las evaluaciones sean efectivas, ayudando a mejorar en el futuro.
(4) Los 'arguments' son fundamentales para una propuesta convincente, respaldados por datos relevantes.
(5) Un 'overview' es un resumen que permite comprender rápidamente el contenido del documento completo.

content.prompt_es: Complete the sentences by transforming the base words into the correct forms.
content.main_text: In academic writing, it is essential to maintain a high level of professionalism and (1)___ (ACCURATE) while presenting your findings. A thorough (2)___ (ANALYZE) of the data can lead to significant (3)___ (IMPROVE) in your research quality. Many scholars argue that a strong theoretical (4)___ (FOUND) is necessary for any (5)___ (DISCUSS) in the field.
content.explanation:
(1) La palabra 'exactitud' es el sustantivo que se forma a partir del adjetivo 'preciso'.
(2) Aquí, 'análisis' es el sustantivo correspondiente al verbo 'analizar'.
(3) Se necesita el sustantivo plural 'mejoras', derivado del verbo 'mejorar'.
(4) El sustantivo 'fundación' se forma a partir del verbo 'fundar'.
(5) Aquí, 'discusión' es el sustantivo relacionado con el verbo 'discutir'.
